name: Rite of Life (Proof of Concept)
description:
Rite of Life a life-sim RPG for PC.

Key Features

  • Procedurally generated environments
  • In-game economy growth influenced directly by you
  • Personal character customisation as you level up
  • Tried and tested turn-based combat system with a unique twist

Inspired by games such as Harvest Moon, Pokemon & Monster Hunter.

Facebook - www.facebook.com/RebourneStudios

Twitter - www.twitter.com/RebourneStudios

Music by Sabrielle Augustin (Village and Field themes)

You can check out more of Sabrielle's work here;

https://www.facebook.com/Sabriellemusique

https://soundcloud.com/sabrielleamusic-1

Main Menu & Battle themes provided by RPG Maker VX Ace.

This game was developed using Unity.

This is currently the demo, we will announce more features as development continues. We have much planned for this game and we hope you enjoy what is available so far and can see the potential the game has.
